original_text: The master spoke to his servant again. “Go to the roads and fields outside the town, and look for people there. Command them all to come here, so that my house will be full.
korean_text: 주인이 종에게 이르되 길과 산울타리 가로 나가서 사람을 강권하여 데려다가 내 집을 채우라

sentences.original_text: The master spoke to his servant again.
"Go to the roads and fields outside the town,
Command them all to come here,
so that my house will be full."
sentences.korean_translation: 내 집이 가득 차게 하기 위함입니다."
